name.baseName: Soil remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Phytoextraction remediation ; Engineering implementation ; Planting
土壤修复;原位修复;植物提取修复;工程实施;种植

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 此工业流程关联环境管理领域，尤为原位植物提取技术在土壤修复中的应用。该过程适用于具有高金属含量的土壤去污染，包括但不限于铅（Pb）、砷（As）和铊（Tl）。过程中包括使用能够从之前受污染工业区的土壤中提取有毒元素的高累积植物。此特定应用适合于无法进行土壤挖掘的区域，并意图以最小的生态干扰恢复土地供未来使用。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The site taken as a reference for the remediation is an area of 712 m2 located in a disused industrial district of Tuscany (Italy), in the past subjected to various productive activities that led to contamination with various metals, some of which potentially toxic such as lead (Pb), arsenic (As) and thallium (Tl). As it is a “site of national interest”, its exact location is considered confidential and cannot be disclosed.

technology.technologicalApplicability: This industrial process relates to the environmental management sector, particularly the in-situ phytoextraction technique for soil remediation. It is applied to decontaminate soils with high concentrations of metals, including but not limited to lead (Pb), arsenic (As), and thallium (Tl). The process involves using high accumulator plants capable of extracting toxic elements from soil in a previously contaminated industrial district. This specific application is suitable for areas where soil excavation is impractical and is intended to restore land for future use with minimal ecological disturbance.
此工业流程关联环境管理领域，尤为原位植物提取技术在土壤修复中的应用。该过程适用于具有高金属含量的土壤去污染，包括但不限于铅（Pb）、砷（As）和铊（Tl）。过程中包括使用能够从之前受污染工业区的土壤中提取有毒元素的高累积植物。此特定应用适合于无法进行土壤挖掘的区域，并意图以最小的生态干扰恢复土地供未来使用。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Vocciante, M., De Folly D’Auris, A., Franchi, E., Petruzzelli, G. & Ferro, S. CO2 footprint analysis of consolidated and innovative technologies in remediation activities. J Clean Prod 297, 126723 (2021).

Vocciante, M., De Folly D’Auris, A., Franchi, E., Petruzzelli, G. & Ferro, S. CO2 footprint analysis of consolidated and innovative technologies in remediation activities. J Clean Prod 297, 126723 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data for Life Cycle Assessment, consider the boundary conditions of the specific site and the confidentiality of its exact location. Assumptions regarding technological applicability should be made based on similar climatic and soil conditions as the reference site. Take into account the time required for plants to accumulate metals and the subsequent harvest and disposal phases. This data set should not be applied to sites with different contamination or soil characteristics without proper adjustments. Ensure any modeling of use phase behavior accurately reflects the slow and biological nature of phytoextraction.
在使用此数据进行生命周期评估时，请考虑特定现场的边界条件以及其确切位置的保密性。应基于与参考站点相似的气候和土壤条件做出技术适用性的假设。考虑植物累积金属所需时间、以及随后的收获和处置阶段。若未经适当调整，本数据组不应用于具有不同污染或土壤特征的站点。确保任何使用阶段行为的建模准确反映了植物提取的缓慢和生物学特性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
